game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where memories can be transferred from one person to another, the fabric of reality is threatened by a mysterious force known as "The Devourer". Players take on the role of a gifted Memory Keeper who must navigate the blurred lines between past and present to uncover the truth behind The Devourer's existence and save humanity from erasure.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player character receiving a cryptic message from an unknown source, leading them to an ancient ruin where they discover a powerful artifact known as the "Chrono Crystal". As they hold the crystal, they are flooded with visions of the past and present, setting them on a quest to uncover the secrets of The Devourer.
game.ending: The player's journey culminates in a final confrontation with The Devourer, a being revealed to be a future version of humanity's collective consciousness. To save humanity, the player must make a choice between preserving the timeline or erasing it, each option leading to a unique ending that determines the fate of the world.
